alert.note: Alert for Northern Berkshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued May 26 at 3:30AM EDT until May 26 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 33 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...The western and southern Adirondacks, western Mohawk Valley, Schoharie Valley, eastern Catskills, Lake George Saratoga Region, northern Taconics of eastern New York, southern Vermont and the northern Berkshires of western Massachusetts. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 8 AM EDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost and/or cold temperatures could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
